name: Name is
aboutmeDes: I'm a Software Developer, with a strong background in Front-End development and some experience in Back-End, also experience in game development with Unity , Currently I'm deepening my knowledge in data structures and constantly sharpening my skills. I have a passion for learning new technologies, and I am committed to continuous improvement!(: ðŸš€.
techToolsDes: The ones i am more confortable with:
cryptoControlDes: Cryptocurrency control, with the possibility of calculating market prices using an external API, which updates and displays real-time prices.
expenseTrackerDes: Personal expense tracker, with the ability to add, edit, and delete expenses, using LocalStorage to store the data and keep it in the browser.
formRestAPIDes: Form that consumes a RestAPI, with the ability to add, edit, and delete data.
kidboxDes: Theme of the Jam: 'Quarantine'. A boy appears on a desolate street, amidst his confusion within a completely strange world and piqued by curiosity, he will make the decision to discover what happened to the entire world, avoiding the silhouettes that stalk him during his trip, maintaining a stealth which will help him advance by finding clues with which to calm his curiosity, in order to find an unexpected ending...
takeRootDes: Theme of the Jam: 'Roots'. 3 Plataform levels, with a main character a Fongus that can jump and use his hook to grab and move through the map easily, even use shortcuts, at the end trying to reach his pot and sleep(:!.
wasteShopDes: This immersive virtual reality video game is set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. In this game, players take on the role of a trader in a small store in the middle of the wasteland, selling valuable items and resources, having a time and score, become the manager of the store climbing the real Leaderboard.
